chapter.name: Delicious Tutorials: Stutter
chapter.p: In one of my formative computer music classes, the professor showed us how to write an entire song using only a speech made by then President George W. Bush. He took the speech, chopped it up into tiny loops, then brough them into Max and started layering them. This patch takes a similar approach, though mercifully President Bush will be absent. Use the number keys to jump to different places in the sound file, and use the keys A through J to change the loop length.
